mapper.select: SELECT SI.SI_LOCATION AS IMAGE_LOCATE FROM STOREIMAGE SI INNER JOIN STOREMENU SM ON SI.SI_CODE = SM.SM_SICODE WHERE (SUBSTR(SI.SI_CODE,1,10) = SM.SM_STCODE AND SM.SM_STCODE = #{storeCode}) AND ((SUBSTR(SI.SI_CODE,11,13)) = SM.SM_CODE AND SM.SM_CODE = #{menuList[0].menuCode})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SALESLOG(SL_STCODE, SL_LOCODE, SL_STATE, SL_DATE) VALUES(#{storeCode}, #{locationList[0].locationCode}, #{salesLogList[0].salesState},SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO STOREMENU(SM_STCODE, SM_CODE, SM_NAME, SM_PRICE, SM_SICODE, SM_ISMAIN, SM_ISKIOSK, SM_ISSOLD) VALUES(#{storeCode},#{menuList[0].menuCode},#{menuList[0].menuName}, #{menuList[0].menuPrice},#{menuList[0].menuImageCode},#{menuList[0].isMain},#{menuList[0].isKiosk},#{menuList[0].isSoldOut})
mapper.select: SELECT SA_PAYMENTTYPE AS salespaymentType, SA_PRICE AS amount, SA_DATE AS salesDate FROM POSDBA.SALES WHERE SA_STCODE = #{storeCode} order by SA_ODOSTIME desc

SELECT SA_ODOSTIME AS orderList[0].salesDate, SA_PAYMENTTYPE AS orderList[0].orderPaymentType, SA_PRICE AS orderList[0].amount, LO_ADDR AS locationList[0].locationAddr, LO_DETAIL AS locationList[0].locationDetail FROM POSDBA.SALES SA INNER JOIN POSDBA.LOCATION ON SA_LOCODE = LO_CODE AND SA_STCODE = LO_STCODE WHERE SA_STCODE = #{storeBean} AND SA_DATE= #{orderList[0].salesDate};
SELECT SA_PAYMENTTYPE AS salespaymentType, SA_PRICE AS amount FROM POSDBA.SALES WHERE SA_PAYMENTTYPE = #{orderList[0].salespaymentType} AND SA_STCODE =#{storeCode}

SELECT SM_NAME AS menuName, SM_PRICE AS menuPrice, OD_COUNT AS quantity FROM POSDBA.SALES SA INNER JOIN POSDBA.ORDERSDETAIL ON SA_ODOSTIME = OD_OSDATE AND SA_STCODE = OD_OSSTCODE INNER JOIN POSDBA.STOREMENU ON OD_SMCODE = SM_CODE AND SA_STCODE = SM_STCODE WHERE SA_STCODE = #{storeCode} AND SA_DATE = to_date(#{orderList[0].salesDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

SELECT LO_ADDR AS locationAddr, LO_DETAIL AS locationDetail FROM POSDBA.SALES SA INNER JOIN POSDBA.LOCATION ON SA_LOCODE = LO_CODE AND SA_STCODE = LO_STCODE WHERE SA_STCODE = #{storeCode} AND SA_DATE = to_date(#{orderList[0].salesDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STOREMENU WHERE SM_STCODE = #{storeCode} AND SM_NAME = #{menuList[0].menuName}
SELECT MAX(SM_CODE) FROM STOREMENU WHERE SM_STCODE = #{storeCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POSDBA.LOCATION (LO_STCODE,LO_CODE,LO_NAME,LO_LATITUDE,LO_LONGITUDE,LO_DETAIL,LO_ADDR) VALUES(#{storeCode},(SELECT'L'||LPAD(NVL(SUBSTR(MAX(LO_CODE),2,2),-1)+1,2,'0') FROM LOCATION WHERE LO_STCODE = #{storeCode}),#{locationList[0].locationName} ,#{locationList[0].latitude},#{locationList[0].longitude},#{locationList[0].locationDetail},#{locationList[0].locationAddr})
mapper.select: select SM_CODE as menuCode, SM_NAME as menuName, SM_PRICE as menuPrice, SM_SICODE as menuImageCode , SM_ISMAIN as isMain, SM_ISKIOSK as isKiosk, SM_ISSOLD as isSoldOut from storemenu where SM_STCODE=#{storeCode} ORDER BY SM_ISMAIN DESC

select LO_CODE as locationCode, LO_NAME as locationName, LO_LATITUDE as latitude, LO_LONGITUDE as longitude, LO_DETAIL as locationDetail,LO_ADDR as locationAddr from location WHERE LO_STCODE=#{storeCode}
select sl_state as salsesState from saleslog where sl_date=(select max(sl_date) from saleslog where sl_stcode= #{storeCode} GROUP BY sl_stcode)
mapper.update: update location set LO_NAME = #{locationList[0].locationName}, LO_LATITUDE = #{locationList[0].latitude}, LO_LONGITUDE = #{locationList[0].longitude}, LO_DETAIL = #{locationList[0].locationDetail},LO_ADDR = #{locationList[0].locationAddr} WHERE LO_STCODE=#{storeCode} and LO_CODE = #{locationList[0].locationCode}
mapper.delete: delete from location where LO_STCODE =#{storeCode} and LO_CODE=#{locationList[0].locationCode}
mapper.select: select sa_paymenttype as paymentType , count(*) as count, nvl(sum(sa_price),0) as amount from sales where to_char(sa_date,'yyyymmdd') >= to_char(sysdate-#{period},'yyyymmdd') and sa_stcode = #{storeCode} group by sa_paymenttype

SELECT SM_NAME AS menuName, SUM(OD_COUNT) AS quantity, sum(Sm_PRICE) AS menuPrice FROM ORDERSDETAIL OD INNER JOIN POSDBA.SALES ON OD_OSDATE = SA_ODOSTIME AND OD_OSSTCODE = SA_STCODE INNER JOIN POSDBA.STOREMENU ON OD_SMCODE = SM_CODE AND OD_OSSTCODE = SM_STCODE WHERE to_char(od_osdate,'yyyymmdd') >= to_char(sysdate-#{period},'yyyymmdd') AND OD_OSSTCODE = #{storeCode} GROUP BY SM_NAME order by quantity desc

SELECT LO_NAME AS locationName,lo_code, LO_ADDR AS locationAddr, LO_DETAIL AS locationDetail, count(*) AS locationCount, SUM(SA_PRICE) AS locationAmount FROM POSDBA.LOCATION LO INNER JOIN POSDBA.SALES ON LO_STCODE = SA_STCODE AND LO_CODE = SA_LOCODE WHERE to_char(SA_DATE,'yyyymmdd') >= to_char(sysdate-#{period},'yyyymmdd') AND LO_STCODE = #{storeCode} GROUP BY LO_NAME, LO_ADDR, LO_DETAIL,lo_code order by locationCount desc
